system.Text:
**When your relationship with a connection is tested through conflict, betrayal, or circumstance**, roll +heart. If you share a bond, add +1.

On a **strong hit**, @Compendium[foundry-supersworn.starforgedmoves.141aec8b92efd14b]{Develop Your Relationship}.

On a **weak hit**, @Compendium[foundry-supersworn.starforgedmoves.141aec8b92efd14b]{Develop Your Relationship}, but also envision a demand or complication as a fallout of this test.

On a **miss**, or if you have no interest in maintaining this relationship, choose one.

  * Lose the connection: Envision how this impacts you and @Compendium[foundry-supersworn.starforgedmoves.78baa51694fe37c5]{Pay the Price}.
  * Prove your loyalty: Envision what you offer or what they demand, and @Compendium[foundry-supersworn.starforgedmoves.9c9ab6a42daa96e0]{Swear an Iron Vow} (formidable or greater) to see it done. Until you complete the quest, take no benefit for the connection. If you refuse or fail the quest, the connection is permanently undone.
